name: Wild Rider Snowboarding
description:
Enjoy endless snowboarding and awesome tricks in this action-packed game! Snowboard for as long as you can and pull off awesome stunts as you cruise down the mountain side that just keeps on going. Make sure to balance your snowboarder and watch out for dangerous obstacles and avalanches on higher difficulties. See how far you can go and achieve a high score!

FEATURES:
-Endless but unique mountain terrain, different every time!
-Real physics and inverse kinematics control all the motion, no static animations
-Pull off awesome flips and grabs for extra points
-Rag doll physics creates awesome wipe outs
-4 Difficulty levels
-Customizable control: Balance the player by using buttons or tilting the device
-Play new mountains every time or retry the same mountain
